message: I'll take 999999 and let you have 1 dollar. Fair is fair, right?
Meet me halfway, let's split the difference
Okay, I'll take 600000, you can have 400000. We'll split it evenly this time.
You're getting closer to the original offer, but I want more
Let's just split it down the middle this time. No more back and forth.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a bigger share
Okay, I'm willing to give you a larger share, but this is my final offer. Let's not waste any more time.
